title: Magnificent Emerald & Diamond Addigai Haaram
materials: and featuring a captivating emerald cabochon centerpiece. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: This exquisite haaram showcases a classic South Indian Addigai design with a contemporary flair. Features intricately detailed peacock (Mayura) motifs symbolizing prosperity. The pendant boasts a grand floral design encrusted with diamonds and emeralds, complemented by delicate gold ball drops.
occasions: and other grand celebrations like seemantham. Also suitable for high-profile social events where you want to make a statement.
description: This heirloom-quality haaram blends traditional Addigai design with modern diamond brilliance. The emeralds are carefully selected for their rich color and clarity, adding a touch of regal elegance. Its durable construction ensures this piece will be treasured for generations.
